metadata.name: PITCHER OF LIFE
metadata.description:
FILL IT WITH LOVE, COMPASSION & PEACE LIVE IT TO THE FULLEST, QUENCH YOUR THIRSTS â€˜CAUSE THIS IS A MUD HOUSE ON LEASE. THERE IS ONLY NOW BUT NO TOMORROW, WE DO NOT REALISE. QUICKLY FILL YOUR PITCHER OF LIFE WITH LOVE, COMPASSION & PEACE.

This is a canvas painting by one of the renowned artists of INDIA.

You have an option to only keep the NFT Only or we can deliver you the physical painting as well (Delivery shall be extra), in case you choose only NFT we shall store the painting with us for as long as possible.
